entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with rain this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
